channel.title: Please help with special attack coding

item.title: Please help with special attack coding
item.dc:creator: @yancey112 yancey112
item.description:
@yancey112 wrote:

i was wondering if somebody knew how to add this
Always goes through defence, the hit being (maxHit * 0.50) + random(maxHit)

case 14484:
c.gfx0(1247); c.startAnimation(4000); if
(c.playerIndex > 0) { Client opp = (Client)
Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]; if(opp != null)
opp.gfx0(1248); } else if (c.npcIndex > 0) { NPC opp =
Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex]; if(opp != null) opp.gfx0(1248); }
c.specAccuracy = 5.00; c.specDamage = 2.00; c.ssSpec = true;
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems()
.getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) .toLowerCase());
break;

if you know how to make that code ^^ hit ur max hit*.50+random(maxhit) then please codeit and post it and ill add u on rs if u want the 2m
thank you and hope somebody can help.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help with special attack coding
